actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property

official_title: To extend the patent numbered RE 38,014 (BIEBERSTEIN) for a period of 2 years.

summary.text: Requires the Under Secretary of Commerce for Intellectual Property and Director of the United States Patent and Trademark Office to extend the patent numbered RE 38,014 (BIEBERSTEIN) (relating to the Maglite flashlight) for two additional years.

titles.title: To extend the patent numbered RE 38,014 (BIEBERSTEIN) for a period of 2 years.
